ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | 2str.g | |- G = { <. ( Base ` ndx ) , B >. , <. ( E ` ndx ) , .+ >. } |
| 2 |  | 2str.e | |- E = Slot N |
| 3 |  | 2str.l | |- 1 < N |
| 4 |  | 2str.n | |- N e. NN |
| 5 | 1, 2, 3, 4 | #P_2strstr | |- G Struct <. 1 , N >. |
| 6 |  | #P_baseid | |- Base = Slot ( Base ` ndx ) |
| 7 |  | #P_snsspr1 | |- { <. ( Base ` ndx ) , B >. } C_ { <. ( Base ` ndx ) , B >. , <. ( E ` ndx ) , .+ >. } |
| 8 | 7, 1 | #P_sseqtr4i | |- { <. ( Base ` ndx ) , B >. } C_ G |
| 9 | 5, 6, 8 | #P_strfv | |- ( B e. V -> B = ( Base ` G ) ) |
